name: WarBox: Camouflage
description: WarBox: Camouflage represents the first entry in the WarBox franchise. Camouflage is an exciting, team-based first-person shooter with a strong emphasis on fun gameplay and free access to all players. Engage your opponents in combat as various class-based characters. As the commander, you are able to use skills to point out enemies and their artillery. As the scout, you're able to tag enemy resources for easier destruction when attacked by your allies. As the medic, you are able to revive fallen allies and poison enemy opposition with varying forms of gases and serums.
